regex: wrong account name or password
message_cn: 登陆帐号/密码出错
message_en: wrong account name or password

regex: The session is invalid, either wrong session id or the session has been expired
message_cn: session过期，或者提供了不正确的session id
message_en: The session is invalid, either wrong session id or the session has been expired

regex: .*certificate has expired or is not yet valid
message_cn: 当前系统时间不在镜像仓库证书有效期内, 调整过镜像仓库服务器的系统时间，或者证书被修改
message_en: current System time has expired for imagestore certification, imagestore server system time or certification might be modified

regex: duplicate backup storage. There has been an image store backup storage.*
message_cn: 重复的镜像仓库ip地址,该地址己经被[%1$s]使用
message_en: duplicate backup storage. There has been an host[%1$s]

regex: Fn::Join must be array and contain 2 params, .*
message_cn: Fn::Join后面的参数出错，该参数应包含2个参数，第一个为String,第二个为数组
message_en: Fn::Join must be array and contain 2 params, array[0] must be String, array[1] must be array!

regex: Param .* has no value or default value found!
message_cn: Parameter中的[%1$s]字段没有输入，并且也没有缺省值
message_en: Parameter [%1$s] has no value or default value found!

regex: %s is not existed or is empty folder
message_cn: 不存在的文件: %1$s, 或文件夹为空
message_en: %1$s is not existed or is empty folder

regex: read error elaboration template files [%s] failed, due to: %s
message_cn: 无法读取错误码文件: %1$s
message_en: read error elaboration template files [%1$s] failed

regex: input args 'regex' or 'category' must be set
message_cn: 输入参数中'regex'或'category'必须设置
message_en: input args 'regex' or 'category' must be set

regex: %s is not a Long value Number
message_cn: 输入参数中'%1$s'不是有效的Long字段
message_en: %1$s is not a Long value Number

regex: arg 'startTime' should format like 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' or '1545380003000'
message_cn: 输入参数中'startTime'的格式应该类似'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' 或者 '1545380003000'
message_en: arg 'startTime' should format like 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' or '1545380003000'

regex: elaboration code must be number!
message_cn: 错误码必须是个数字
message_en: elaboration code must be number

regex: host is connecting, ping failed
message_cn: 物理机正在连接, 不能进行ping操作
message_en: host is connecting, cannot ping

regex: User name or password or port number may be problematic
message_cn: 用户名、密码或者端口可能是错误的
message_en: User name or password or port number may be problematic

regex: host[uuid:%s, name:%s] is in status[%s], cannot perform required operation
message_cn: 物理机[%2$s]正处于[%3$s]状态, 当前状态不允许进行该操作
message_en: Host[%2$s] is in status [%3$s], and unable to perform required operation

regex: unable to do the operation because the host is in status of Disconnected
message_cn: 物理机正处于己失联[Disconnected]状态, 物理机不能进行该操作
message_en: Host is in status [Disconnected] and unable to perform required operation

regex: unable to connect to KVM[ip:%s, username:root, sshPort:%s] to check the management node connectivity,please check if username/password is wrong; null
message_cn: 物理机的ssh端口与管理节点不通, 或者ssh端口的用户名密码有误, 不能连接物理机
message_en: ssh port on host unable to connect to management node, or username/password is wrong

regex:
shell command\[sudo PYTHONPATH.*zstacklib-[0-9.]*tar.gz.*failed
 ret code: 1
message_cn: pip安装失败。因为pip安装文件不完整，或者pip版本不正确
message_en: pip install failed, pip install file broken

regex: can not update host\[uuid:.*]which is connecting or creating, please wait.*
message_cn: 无法更新正在连接或添加中的物理机[uuid:%1$s]信息，请稍候
message_en: can not update host[uuid:%1$s]which is connecting or adding, please wait

regex: There has been a L2VlanNetwork[uuid:%s, name:%s] attached to cluster[uuid:%s] that has physical interface[%s], vlan[%s]. Failed to attach L2VlanNetwork[uuid:%s]
message_cn: L2VlanNetwork挂载失败，L2网络的物理接口[%4$s]已经被L2VlanNetwork网络[%2$s]挂载到集群上
message_en: L2VlanNetwork attached failed, the physical interface[%4$s] has already been attached to the cluster by L2VlanNetwork[%2$s]

regex: There has been a l2Network[uuid:%s, name:%s] attached to cluster[uuid:%s] that has physical interface[%s]. Failed to attach l2Network[uuid:%s]
message_cn: L2网络挂载失败, L2网络的物理接口[%4$s]已经被L2网络[%2$s]挂载到集群上
message_en: L2Network attached failed, the physical interface[%4$s] has already been attached to the cluster by L2Network[%2$s]

regex: failed to check physical network interfaces[names : %s] on kvm host[uuid:%s, ip:%s]
message_cn: L2网络挂载失败， 没有在kvm host上找到这个网络物理接口: [%1$s]
message_en: L2 Network attached failed， failed to check physical network interfaces on kvm host: [%1$s]

regex: the license has been expired, please renew it
message_cn: 证书己过期
message_en: the license has been expired

regex: management node[uuid:%s] is unavailable
message_cn: 管理节点暂时不可访问
message_en: management node is unavailable

regex: failed to detach data volume[uuid:%s, installPath:%s] from vm[uuid:%s, name:%s] on kvm host[uuid:%s, ip:%s], because unable to detach the volume from the vm;it's still attached after 5 seconds
message_cn: 由于云主机操作系统限制可能会导致卸载云盘失败，请尝试对云主机关机后再次卸载
message_en: Detach volume may fail due to limitations of the VM operating system, please try again after VM shut down.

regex: .*the physical capacity usage of the host.* has exceeded the threshold.*
message_cn: 物理机[uuid:%1$s]的己用容量超过了阈值[%2$s]
message_en: the physical capacity usage of the host[uuid:%1$s] has exceeded the threshold[%2$s].

regex: required local primary storage.* cannot satisfy conditions.*, or hosts providing the primary storage don't satisfy conditions\[.*, size > .*]
message_cn: localstorage主存储的状态不是Enabled/Connected, 或者主存储内的物理机状态不满足条件：[状态为Enabled/Connected,存储容量 > %6$s字节]
message_en: local primary storage cannot satisfy conditions: status Enabled/Connected, or hosts providing the primary storage don't satisfy conditions: status Enabled/Connectd, size > %6$s bytes

regex: the required host.* or doesn't belong to a local primary storage satisfying conditions.* or its cluster doesn't attach to any local primary storage
message_cn: 所需要的物理机属于以下情况: 1 状态不为Enabled/Connected, 2 所属于的localstorage状态不为enabled/Connected, 3 所属的cluster没有挂载到任何localstorage上
message_en: the required host belong to the bellow conditions: 1 status/state not Enabled/Connected, 2 the localstorages which belong to are not Enabled/Connected, 3 the cluster does not attached to any localstorage

regex: no local primary storage in zone.* or contain hosts satisfying conditions.*
message_cn: 该zone内所有的localstorage都不满足以下条件: 1 状态为Enabled/Connected, 2 没有包含任何状态为Enabled/Connected,并且存储容量 > %6$s字节的物理机
message_en: no local primary storage in the zone is satisfing the bellow conditions: 1 status/state is Enabled/Connectd, 2 contains hosts which is Enabled/Connected and size > %6$s bytes

regex: no local primary storage can satisfy conditions.* or contain hosts satisfying conditions.*, size .*
message_cn: 所有的localstorage都不满足以下条件: 1 状态为Enabled/Connected, 2 没有包含任何状态为Enabled/Connected,并且存储容量 > %6$s字节的物理机
message_en: no local primary storage is satisfing the bellow conditions: 1 status/state is Enabled/Connectd, 2 contains hosts which is Enabled/Connected and size > %6$s bytes

regex: cannot find any qualified primary storage, errors are.*physical capacity usage has exceeded the threshold.*
message_cn: 找不到符合条件的主存储主存储,主存储的己用物理容量超过了所设阈值
message_en: cannot find any qualified primary storage, physical capacity usage has exceeded the threshold

regex: cannot find any qualified primary storage, errors are.*it has no space.*
message_cn: 找不到符合条件的主存储主存储,主存储的己经没有空间分配所需的容量
message_en: cannot find any qualified primary storage, it has no space

regex: The state of vm[uuid:%s] is %s. Only these state[Running,Stopped] is allowed to update cpu or memory.
message_cn: 云主机的状态为%2$s,只有状态[Running,Stopped]允许升级CPU/内存
message_en: vm status is %2$s now, only states[Running,Stopped] is allowed to update cpu or memory

regex: no Enabled hosts found in the \[[0-9]*] candidate hosts
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为满足分配条件的%1$s个hosts都不处于Enable状态
message_en: unable to allocate hosts, because the %1$s hosts which satisfied to allocate are not in Enable status

regex: no Connected hosts found in the \[[0-9]*] candidate hosts
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为满足分配条件的%1$s个hosts都不处于Connected状态
message_en: unable to allocate hosts, because the %1$s hosts which satisfied to allocate are not in Connected status

regex: no Connected hosts found in the \[[0-9]*] candidate hosts having the hypervisor type \[.*]
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为满足分配条件的%1$s个hosts都不是%2$s的虚拟化类型
message_en: unable to allocate hosts, because the %1$s hosts which satisfied to allocate are not %2$s hypervisor type

regex: no host having cpu\[[0-9]*], memory\[[0-9]* bytes] found
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为可以用于分配vm的host都没有足够的资源: cpu [%1$s], 内存 [%2$s]
message_en: unable to allocate hosts, because no hosts has enough resource: cpu [%1$s], memory [%2$s]

regex: the vm.*, but the host is either not having enough CPU/memory or in the state\[Enabled] or status\[Connected] to start the vm
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为该主存储的vm只能启动在host[%2$s]上，但这个host没有足够的cpu/memory资源，或不处于Enabled/Connected 状态
message_en: the vm can only be started on the host[%2$s] because of its primary storage, but the host is either not having enough cpu/memory, or in the Enabled/Connected status

regex: after filtering, .* returns zero candidate host, it means: .*
message_cn: 创建云主机在[%1$s]这个过滤器后找不到满足条件的host了，这意味着 [%2$s]
message_en: after filtering[%1$s] returns zero candidate host, it means: [%2$s]

regex: No host with .* found
message_cn: 以下条件导致分配时没有可满足的host: %1$s
message_en: No host with [%1$s] found

regex: unable to start the vm.*It doesn't have any nic, please attach a nic and try again
message_cn: 网卡删除后，无法启动主机
message_en: cannot start vm because it doesn't have any nic

regex: The vm's root volume is on the local storage.* however, the host on which the root volume is has been deleted
message_cn: 云主机的根盘在localstorage的主存储上,并且该根盘所在的host己经被删除
message_en: The vm's root volume is on the local storage. however, the host on which the root volume is has been deleted

regex: no host having state=Enabled status=Connected.*found
message_cn: 找不到状态为Enabled/Connected的host
message_en: no host having state=Enabled status=Connected found

regex: no host found in clusters that has attached to L2Networks which have L3Networks.*
message_cn: 这个L3网络所在的L2网络加载的所有集群中，都没有host
message_en: no host found in clusters that has attached to L2Networks which have L3Networks

regex: no host found in clusters which have attached to all primary storage .* volumes locate
message_cn: 与vm的volume所在的主存储所关联的所有集群中，都没有host
message_en: no host found in clusters which have attached to all primary storage which the vm's volumes locate
